wikipedia_page.main: Darren Collier (born 1 December 1967) is an English former footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Football League for Blackburn Rovers and Darlington, in the Hong Kong First Division League for Sing Tao, and in the Scottish League for Berwick Rangers. He was born in Stockton-on-Tees, and began his professional football career on a non-contract basis with Middlesbrough.
